title: Schedule 3 and Rule 1(2)(b)(x) of Part 5 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 15) (Earnings Disregard) 
Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2022 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2022. 

Definition
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) (amendment) (no 15) (earnings disregard) regulation 2022 (2) regulation social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2022 shall construed together one may cited together social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2022 definition

2.

Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 783 of 2021).

title: Schedule 3 and Rule 1(2)(b)(x) of Part 5 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare
heading: 3. These Regulations come into operation—
text_raw:
3. These Regulations come into operation— 

(a) 

in so far as they relate to disability allowance, on 4 January 
2023, and 

(b) 

in so far as they relate to blind pension, on 6 January 2023. 

Earnings disregard
text_norm: 3 regulation come operation-- (a) far relate disability allowance 4 january 2023 (b) far relate blind pension 6 january 2023 earnings disregard

title: Schedule 3 and Rule 1(2)(b)(x) of Part 5 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare
heading: 4. The Social Welfare Consolidated Claims Payments and Control
text_raw:
4. The Social Welfare Consolidated Claims Payments and Control 

Regulations 2007 are amended— 

in article 147(1)(d), (amended by article 4(c) of the Regulations 
of 2021), by the substitution of “€165” for “€140”, 

(a) 

and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [614] 3 

(b) 

in article 150, (amended by article 4(d) of the Regulations of 
2021) — 

(i) 

by the substitution of “150. (1)” for “150(1)(a)”, 

and 

(ii) 

in sub-article (1)(d), by the substitution of “€165” for 
“€140”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 November, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection.

title: Schedule 3 and Rule 1(2)(b)(x) of Part 5 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for increases in the earning disregards from 
employment or self-employment, for Disability Allowance and Blind Pension 
arising from Budget 2023. 

The earnings disregard will be increased from €140 to €165 with effect from 4 
January 2023 in the case of Disability Allowance and from 6 January 2023 in 
the case of Blind Pension. 

The Regulations also correct a minor typographical numbering misprint in 
article 150. 

 
 
 
 
 [614] 5
